description: Specialization abilities for Acrobatics (Gantry-Runner), Stealth (Myrk-gengr), and Wasteland Survival (Veioimaor, Myr-Stalker, Gantry-Runner) skills

veioimaor.name: Veioimaor
veioimaor.description: Master hunters of the wasteland who track living prey with preternatural skill and claim hunting territories as their own

abilities.name: [Beast Tracker]
abilities.description: Gain +2d10 when tracking living creatures in the wasteland
narrativeTemplates: Your hunter's instincts sharpen as you recognize the signs of living prey.
The creature's trail speaks to you in ways others cannot perceive.

abilities.name: [Predator's Eye]
abilities.trigger: After a successful tracking check against a living creature
abilities.description: Reveal the tracked creature's weakness and behavior pattern
narrativeTemplates: You discern the creature's vulnerability to {weakness} and recognize its {behavior} behavior.
Your predator's eye reveals the beast's weakness and hunting patterns.

abilities.name: [Hunting Grounds]
abilities.description: Mark an area as your hunting grounds, granting +2d10 to all Wasteland Survival checks in the zone until rest
limitations: Only one hunting grounds marker can be active at a time
Marking a new area automatically clears any existing marker
narrativeTemplates: You mark {areaName} as your hunting grounds. The territory feels familiar now.
This land is yours. Every survival instinct sharpens within these bounds.

myr-stalker.name: Myr-Stalker
myr-stalker.description: Survivors who have mastered the treacherous mires and swamps, immune to the poisons that claim lesser wanderers

abilities.name: [Swamp Navigator]
abilities.description: Gain +1d10 to all Wasteland Survival checks in swamp or marsh terrain
narrativeTemplates: The mire's secrets are no mystery to you.
You read the swamp's treacherous surface with practiced ease.

abilities.name: [Toxin Resistance]
abilities.description: Gain advantage on saves against poison gas hazards
narrativeTemplates: Years in the mire have hardened your lungs against toxic vapors.
The poison gas that would fell others merely stings your throat.

abilities.name: [Mire Knowledge]
abilities.trigger: When navigating through a bog or swamp
abilities.description: Reveal a safe path through the mire, avoiding hazards
narrativeTemplates: You identify a safe path: {pathDescription}
Your knowledge of the mire reveals a route that avoids the worst hazards.

ws-gantry-runner.name: Gantry-Runner (Wasteland)
ws-gantry-runner.description: Urban survivors who navigate the ruins with unmatched skill, finding paths and resources where others see only rubble

abilities.name: [Urban Navigator]
abilities.description: Gain +1d10 to all Wasteland Survival checks in ruins terrain
narrativeTemplates: The urban wasteland is your domain.
You navigate the crumbling cityscape with instinctive familiarity.

abilities.name: [Rooftop Routes]
abilities.trigger: When seeking an elevated path through ruins
abilities.description: Reveal an elevated route across rooftops and gantries that bypasses ground-level obstacles
narrativeTemplates: You spot an elevated route: {routeDescription}
Your eyes trace a path across the rooftops that others would never see.

abilities.name: [Scrap Familiar]
abilities.description: Gain +1d10 when foraging in ruins terrain
narrativeTemplates: You know exactly where the useful scraps hide in these ruins.
The urban wasteland yields its treasures to your practiced eye.

gantry-runner.name: Gantry-Runner
gantry-runner.description: Masters of urban acrobatics, specializing in rooftop traversal and death-defying leaps

abilities.name: [Roof-Runner]
abilities.description: Reduce climbing stages required by 1 (minimum 1 stage)
narrativeTemplates: Your expertise finds an efficient route up.
You instinctively trace the fastest path upward.

abilities.name: [Death-Defying Leap]
abilities.description: Add +10 ft to your maximum leap distance
narrativeTemplates: You push beyond normal limits.
Your leap defies what others believe possible.

abilities.name: [Wall-Run]
abilities.description: Run vertically up a wall as a combat action (DC 3 Acrobatics)
limitations: Must end on a surface or fall
narrativeTemplates: You sprint up the wall, defying gravity with each stride.
Your feet find impossible purchase on the vertical surface.

abilities.name: [Double Jump]
abilities.description: Reroll a failed leap check with +1d10 bonus (once per day)
abilities.trigger: After failing a leap check but before falling
narrativeTemplates: You twist mid-air, defying gravity for a precious moment.
A second burst of effort propels you further.

abilities.name: [Featherfall]
abilities.description: Auto-succeed Crash Landing checks with DC â‰¤ 3
narrativeTemplates: You land with preternatural grace, absorbing the impact effortlessly.
Your body instinctively knows how to fall.

myrk-gengr.name: Myrk-gengr
myrk-gengr.description: Shadow-walkers who move unseen through darkness and manipulate concealment

abilities.name: [Slip into Shadow]
abilities.trigger: Entering shadows, dim light, or darkness
abilities.description: Enter [Hidden] without using an action when entering shadows
requirements: Area has shadows or low lighting
narrativeTemplates: You melt into the shadows without breaking stride.
The darkness welcomes you like an old friend.

abilities.name: [Ghostly Form]
abilities.description: Stay [Hidden] after making an attack (once per encounter)
narrativeTemplates: You strike from the shadows and vanish once more.
Your presence flickers like smoke after the attack.

abilities.name: [Cloak the Party]
abilities.description: Grant party members within 30 ft +2d10 on Passive Stealth (concentration)
narrativeTemplates: You extend your shroud of shadows to your companions.
Your allies fade from perception as your will envelops them.

abilities.name: [One with the Static]
abilities.trigger: Entering a zone with [Psychic Resonance] environmental tag
abilities.description: Automatically enter [Hidden] in [Psychic Resonance] zones
narrativeTemplates: The psychic static envelops you, hiding you from perception.
The resonance distorts your presence, making you invisible to minds.

abilities.name: [Umbral Strike]
abilities.description: Shadow-infused melee attack dealing weapon damage + 2d6 shadow damage from the shadows
requirements: Must be in DimLight or Darkness
narrativeTemplates: Shadows coalesce around your blade as you strike from the darkness.
You channel the void into your weapon, darkness trailing behind the blow.
Your strike carries the weight of shadow, tearing through defenses with dark energy.

abilities.name: [Shadow Clone]
abilities.description: Create an illusory shadow duplicate to confuse and distract enemies
narrativeTemplates: A shadow peels away from you, taking your shape as it steps into existence.
Darkness congeals beside you, forming a perfect mirror of your silhouette.
You split the shadows, and another you emerges from the dark.

abilities.name: [Void Touched]
abilities.description: Your communion with the void grants resistance to Aetheric energy
narrativeTemplates: The void within you absorbs the Aetheric energy, dissipating it harmlessly.
Your bond with the dark between-spaces shields you from the raw power of the Aether.
